plugin.name: 7KeyInput
plugin.desc: This is a virtual keyboard with only few keys. Each plugin must be controllable by the provided keys.
plugin.author: Harald D. Wagner (HdWagner)
plugin.documenttext: This is a virtual keyboard with only few keys. Each plugin must be controllable by the provided keys, as they define the minimum functionality of any input device.

plugin.name: Console Sound Theme
plugin.author: Zag2me (zag2me)
plugin.documenttext:
Install the theme then enable the sound plugin.
Configure the sound theme in the sound player properties.

plugin.name: Credits Module
plugin.desc: Lists the who's who of MeediOS.
plugin.author: Harald D. Wagner (HdWagner)
plugin.documenttext: This plugin lists the who's who of your MeediOS installation.

plugin.name: DebugUI
plugin.desc: A plugin which reads the properties of the abstract user interface.
plugin.author: Harald D. Wagner (HdWagner)
plugin.documenttext: A plugin which reads the properties of the abstract user interface.

plugin.name: DeleteMissing
plugin.desc: Import plugin that deletes library items where the files have been deleted.
plugin.author: Flop (flclsd)

plugin.name: DiscID
plugin.desc: Identify audio, video, and photo discs. Please read the included documentation.
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)
plugin.documenttext:
This is a full time general plugin that waits for a disc to be inserted into the drive and then processes it based on your selected options. It will identify a variety of discs. Some options are handled by other programs. You should understand how these programs work. The first time a disc is inserted, the plugin will search your computer for these programs based on your options. If the programs are not found, the disc will eject and a screen will be displayed indicating what to install.
This plugin does not contain any code that will decrypt or remove copy protection from any disc. None of the programs that this plugin launches will remove any copy protection. The main point of this plugin is to identify discs based on a calculated hash of the original discs contents. Its likely that any alterations to the original disc will not allow it to be identified properly.
If you select a back up option, you acknowledge by using this plugin that you are familiar with the relevant laws of your country. You acknowledge that this plugin does not remove copy protection and cannot back up commercial discs.

plugin.name: DiskSpace Module
plugin.desc: Shows the free disk space and properties of each available drive.
plugin.author: reverson1 (reverson1)
plugin.documenttext:
Shows the free disk space and properties of each available drive. Selecting any drive entry will update the drive's entry and show the most recent data.
Setup
This plugin has no properties.
Install, add to menu, run MeediOS.

plugin.name: Dutch Translation Theme
plugin.author: RPG and Dana (RPG)
plugin.documenttext: Vertaling van MeediOS naar het Nederlands

plugin.name: EnhancedRegexImporter
plugin.desc: Import files based on .net Regular Expressions
plugin.author: Dakkar (Dakkar)

plugin.name: EvolutionTheme_Suite

plugin.author: crn (skypichat)
plugin.documenttext: Install: EvolutionTheme, EvolutionBackgrounds, EvolutionDarkImageTheme, EvolutionLightImageTheme, EvolutionMedia

plugin.name: ExcelImportExport
plugin.desc: Exports a library section to an Excel file and imports an Excel file into a library section.
plugin.author: Harald D. Wagner (HdWagner)
plugin.documenttext:
This import plugin exports a library section to an Excel file and imports an Excel file into a library section.
Instructions: Add the import to a library section. Choose "import" or "export". Provide a file path. Click "Run selected import".
Hints: Note that the values of the "ID" column are used as primary key. Imported Excel rows with valid ID will override the the section item with this very ID. Excel rows without (valid) ID will create new section items.
Note also that Excel supports up to 65536 rows, 255 columns, 32767 characters per cell. If your library sections exceeds this, some rows or columns might not be exported.

plugin.name: FanArtUtilities
plugin.desc: Delete, Update, and Resize Fan Art
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)

plugin.name: FileRenamer
plugin.desc: Rename and move files and directories based on library tags
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)
plugin.documenttext: WARNING. Before you just run this with blind trust on your library, I recommend testing with a few file copies in a test library. I have run it on my complete library and everything was renamed without error, but I can't test every scenario... If you don't test and your files go POOF, consider your warned...

plugin.author: Stewart Hargrave (EnemyWithin)

plugin.desc: This is a virtual keyboard which randomly sends inputs.
plugin.author: Harald D. Wagner (HdWagner)
plugin.documenttext: This is a virtual keyboard which randomly sends inputs. This is a stress test and each plugin must survive several minutes of this.

plugin.name: Respond
plugin.desc: Respond is an event driven plugin that offers functionality similar to a lite scripting language. The plugin will listen for user-defined events (such as a video starting to play) and answer with user-defined responses.
plugin.author: Stewart Hargrave (EnemyWithin)
plugin.documenttext:
Respond is an event driven plugin that offers functionality similar to a lite scripting language. The plugin will listen for user-defined events (such as a video starting to play) and answer with user-defined responses.
Includes two example scripts. One is very useful for proper queue control with PlayMee.

plugin.name: Rom Importer
plugin.desc: Import roms and get info from allgame.com
plugin.author: erebus44 (erebus44)

plugin.name: RssFeedImporter

plugin.documenttext: Please see included readme.doc or wiki page at http://www.meedios.com/wiki/index.php?title=RunProgram

plugin.name: SmartMovieSorter
plugin.author: Zag2me (zag2me)
plugin.documenttext: A plugin that parses scene filenames and removes common tags to leave just the movie name.

plugin.name: Spanish Translation Theme
plugin.author: Sadman (skypichat)
plugin.documenttext: Translation for many plugins, Meedios Configurator, Evolution Themes, Vision and CarbonV in Spanish

plugin.name: Startup Sound Theme
plugin.desc: Just a nice startup sound for anyone who doesn't like all that clicking ;)
plugin.author: Zag2me (zag2me)

plugin.name: TagCopier
plugin.desc: Copies one library tag to another
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)

plugin.name: TMinusDelete
plugin.desc: This importer will delete files after a specified number of days.
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)
plugin.documenttext:
This importer will delete a file after a specified number of days. This Importer will create tag named "ArchivePreference" . This tag should be populated as either "Temporary" or "Permanent" either manually or via another importer. Temporary files are subject to deletion after a user selected number of days. Permanent files are not deleted. The tag DaysUntilDeletion will count down days each time the importer is run. When this amount is less than 1, the related file and library item will be deleted.
Can also be set to delete "Temporary" files after watched.

plugin.name: TriggerMee
plugin.desc: Monitor folders for new files, and instantly trigger an importer (or anything)
plugin.author: hisdudity, Original code from binary64 (hisdudity)
plugin.documenttext:
TriggerMee
Send messages when a monitored folder is changed in real-time. A message could trigger an importer to run.
Options help:
Folder to watch = mandatory. a single folder to listen to for changes. subdirectories included. can be unc. File masks = mandatory. file mask(s) to listen for. seperate with a space. example: "*.avi .mpg mpeg" without quotes will listen for avi's, mpg's and mpeg's. just enter "*" without quotes for all files. Message to send = mandatory. a meedio message to send when new file found. example: "meedio.message-subject|tag1=value1|tag2=value2" without quotes. Only trigger when file becomes unlocked = if true, only executes the message when file first becomes unlocked. if false, the message is executed without delay. default of checked is recommended. Trigger on load = default=false. if true, when the watcher first connects to a folder, the message will be executed. Trigger on reconnect = default=false. if true, when the watcher is reconnected to a folder after having been disconnected, the message will be executed. Use Smart Hash feature = default=true. if true, a hash table is maintained reflecting the directory monitored.. after a reconnect or connect, if the table has changed, the message will be executed.
Reconnect to disconnected paths (global option) = [integer] Used for when plugin is watching a UNC share, and server connection is lost. How many seconds should this plugin attempt reconnection to all disconnected watchers? Specify -1 or 0 to turn this feature off (not recommended). Blank this entry to use the internal default. Throttle trigger (global option) = [integer] Don't re-trigger the same trigger if trigger triggered in the last x seconds. Blank this entry to use defaults. Any throttled triggers currently get lost/ignored.

plugin.name: TVShowsDataImporter
plugin.desc: Add details and images in your TVShows Library
plugin.author: Dakkar (Dakkar)

plugin.name: TVShowsFileImporter
plugin.desc: This importer reads tvshow names, episode and series numbers from a directory or file name into your libary
plugin.author: Flop (banderson1311)
plugin.documenttext: - Use MediaFolder for set your TVShows folder(s), add this importer in your library and just run- If you want use your own regex, add you regex file with this name and in this folder : C:\MeediOS\data\PluginsSettings\TVShowsFileImporter\CustomRegex.txt

plugin.name: UI Stresstest Module
plugin.desc: This module shows all native MeediOS controls and all property types.
plugin.author: Harald D. Wagner (HdWagner)
plugin.documenttext: This module shows all native MeediOS controls. Each theme must define their design in a way which allows navigation and reading. The plugin also has all property types to test saving/loading/verifying them

plugin.name: ViewsBackup
plugin.desc: Exports/Imports MeediOS Library views to/from XML.
plugin.author: Stewart Hargrave (enemywithin)

plugin.name: Webserver.ClassicClient
plugin.desc: Classic Client Template for MeediOS WebServer.
plugin.author: hisdudity (hisdudity)
plugin.documenttext: Classic Client Template for MeediOS WebServer. Feel free to customize it and share what you came up with.

plugin.name: XML2mee
plugin.desc: Imports XML data into a MeediOS Library. It has built-in support for DVD Profiler, Ant Movie Catalog, Movie Collector, ReplayTV, iTunes and mee2XML.
plugin.author: Stewart Hargrave (EnemyWithin)

plugin.name: XmlImportExport
plugin.author: walts81 (UL By:jkm78)
plugin.documenttext: Add the importer/exporter to your library Set custom properties Run the importer/exporter

plugin.name: 4TR Importer
plugin.desc: Imports TV Recordings produced using For the Record
plugin.author: NeverMind (NeverMind)
plugin.documenttext:
This plugin will import the details of TV or Radio shows recorded using the For the Record system.
Setup ====
Select the types of recordings you wish to import (TV, Radio or Both)
Modify the TVShowsSettings as per screenshot of Advanced Settings. This will ensure that Meedios will show the thumbnails created by For the Record if any subsequent importer cannot find an episode thumbnail.
Add the location(s) of your recordings as shown in the General Settings screenshot.

plugin.name: BTVImporter 2 for BTV 4.8.1+
plugin.desc: Import show information from your BeyondTV library into MeediOS
plugin.author: artfulfox (artfulfox)
plugin.documenttext:
This version of BTVImporter is compatible with BeyondTV versions 4.8.1 and higher. The BeyondTV Login API changed in version 4.8.1. For that reason this plugin will *not* work with any version of BTV prior to v4.8.1.
This version of the BTVImporter has a Debug switch. The Debug switch when enabled will create a new log file every day. It will append debug information to the same log file if the date has not changed. Please note that there is a very large amount of debug information written to the log files so they can take up a lot of disk space. Enable this only if you are having problems.
Log files are written to the Logs subdirectory in the MeediOS data directory (default is c:\meedios\data\logs). This is a very rough version... if you find bugs, let me know!

plugin.name: ControlMee
plugin.desc: ControlMee allows you to use your MeediOS remote to control external applications via key mappings. Supports import/export of program key maps to make it easy to share. Supports a keyboard hook and numeric keyboard.
plugin.author: Stewart Hargrave (EnemyWithin)
plugin.documenttext:
ControlMee allows you to use your MeediOS remote to control external applications via key mappings. Supports import/export of program key maps to make it easy to share.
Directions at: http://controlmee.hargraveusa.com/
*New for v2.1: Added support for a numeric keyboard. Use the number keys (2...9) to type letters like on your cell phone. The max delay setting determines how long the plugin will wait between key presses before resetting the key to its initial numeric value.
***IMPORTANT***
ControlMee must be moved above "InputMapper" in the Fulltime Plug-ins list.

plugin.name: ConvertToNiceCovers

plugin.documenttext: Library for make NiceCovers is from DanoneKID

The first time a disc is inserted, the plugin will search your computer for these programs based on your options. If the programs are not found, the disc will eject and a screen will be displayed indicating what to install.
This plugin does not contain any code that will decrypt or remove copy protection from any disc. None of the programs that this plugin launches will remove any copy protection. The main point of this plugin is to identify discs based on a calculated hash of the original discs contents. plugin.name: Google Calendar Importer
plugin.desc: Imports Google Calendar events into the Library.
plugin.author: NeverMind (Nevermind)
plugin.documenttext:
Imports calendar events from google calendars into a Meedio library.
I have provided a screen file that contains a view called "calendar-events". Set the mode of your view of the library to this in Meedio Configuration's Media Library tab. Add a media module to your menu and set the media library section to your imported calendar library, then set the alternate screen to point at the googlecalendar.screen file.
If you want images to appear along side each calendar entry then place an image file ( *.jpg,*.gif,*.png ) in this plugins images directory. The screen file looks for any images with the same name as the calendar.
It's not very pretty but it does the job. :o)

plugin.name: HomeModule
plugin.desc: A home module that changes fanart or video and show submenu
plugin.author: Dakkar (Dakkar)

plugin.name: iPod Video Encoder
plugin.desc: Encode video to H264 for iPod
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)

plugin.name: ItemTagCounter
plugin.desc: ItemTagCounter provides some tools for counting and creating tags in your libraries.
plugin.author: hisdudity (hisdudity)
plugin.documenttext:
ItemTagCounter comes with different tools to help usage and display of huge libraries.
- custom tag creator : example : release_name|{artist} - {album} [{year} @ {label}] will create the tag {release_name} from other preexisting tags.
- custom counter : example : artist|album will count the number of different albums for each artist. it will creates some tags to use this count.
- index counter : creates an index tag and counts sub-items for a tag.
- index 2 counter : creates a 2-letters index tag and counts sub-items for a tag.

Message Subject "RunProgram.Start" Message[Program] Message[Parameters]
Message[Hidden] When the external program has finished running the following message is sent: Message Subject "RunProgram.Completed" Message[Program ] Message[Parameters] Message[Hidden]

plugin.name: seeSharp
plugin.desc: Script quick n easy imports using C# 2.0 w/ helper library
plugin.author: erebus44 (erebus44)

plugin.name: TiVo TVAP Importer
plugin.desc: Import meta data from text files created by TVAP for TiVo transfers
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)
plugin.documenttext:
http://www.tivocommunity.com/tivo-vb/showthread.php?t=359550
TVAP is a free utility program for TiVo-to-Go (e.g., TiVo Desktop or TiVoPlaylist) users who use VideoReDo (Plus or TV Suite) for editing transferred TiVo files. It runs on a Windows computer with VideoReDo (VRD) and TiVo Desktop installed (for registry settings only). TVAP detects TiVo files being transferred and, when transfer completes, it automatically and silently runs VideoReDo processes on the files as configured by the operator in the program GUI.

plugin.name: TMinusDelete
plugin.desc: This importer will delete files after a specified number of days.
plugin.author: ccrocker (UL By:zag2me)
plugin.documenttext:
This importer will delete a file after a specified number of days. This Importer will create tag named "ArchivePreference" . This tag should be populated as either "Temporary" or "Permanent" either manually or via another importer. Temporary files are subject to deletion after a user selected number of days. Permanent files are not deleted. The tag DaysUntilDeletion will count down days each time the importer is run. When this amount is less than 1, the related file and library item will be deleted.
Can also be set to delete "Temporary" files after watched.

plugin.name: TriggerMee
plugin.desc: Monitor folders for new files, and instantly trigger an importer (or anything)
plugin.author: hisdudity, Original code from binary64 (hisdudity)
plugin.documenttext:
TriggerMee
Send messages when a monitored folder is changed in real-time. A message could trigger an importer to run.
Options help:
Folder to watch = mandatory. a single folder to listen to for changes. subdirectories included. can be unc. File masks = mandatory. file mask(s) to listen for. seperate with a space. example: "*.avi .mpg mpeg" without quotes will listen for avi's, mpg's and mpeg's. just enter "*" without quotes for all files. Message to send = mandatory. a meedio message to send when new file found. example: "meedio.message-subject|tag1=value1|tag2=value2" without quotes. Only trigger when file becomes unlocked = if true, only executes the message when file first becomes unlocked. if false, the message is executed without delay. default of checked is recommended. Trigger on load = default=false. if true, when the watcher first connects to a folder, the message will be executed. Trigger on reconnect = default=false. if true, when the watcher is reconnected to a folder after having been disconnected, the message will be executed. Use Smart Hash feature = default=true. if true, a hash table is maintained reflecting the directory monitored.. after a reconnect or connect, if the table has changed, the message will be executed.
Reconnect to disconnected paths (global option) = [integer] Used for when plugin is watching a UNC share, and server connection is lost. How many seconds should this plugin attempt reconnection to all disconnected watchers? Specify -1 or 0 to turn this feature off (not recommended). Blank this entry to use the internal default. Throttle trigger (global option) = [integer] Don't re-trigger the same trigger if trigger triggered in the last x seconds. Blank this entry to use defaults. Any throttled triggers currently get lost/ignored.

plugin.name: TVScanner
plugin.desc: Scan folder collection for tv shows to import. Uses MediaFolders plugin.

plugin.documenttext:

***IMPORTANT***
Make sure to add USB-UIRT to the Command Input "Input Sources" list of the UI Plugin (i.e. WPFUI). If you don't add it, it won't work.

plugin.desc: An import type plugin for MeediOS capable of downloading synchronized subtitles for your video collection in your prefered language(s).
plugin.author: Skamagkis Stavros (enthalpient)
plugin.documenttext: For release notes, usage instructions, bug reports or suggestions, please refer to the plugin's thread on MeediOS forum.

plugin.name: BTVImporter2 for BTV 4.8.1+
plugin.desc: Import show information from your BeyondTV (v4.8.1+) library into MeediOS
plugin.author: artfulfox (artfulfox)
plugin.documenttext:
This version of BTVImporter is compatible with BeyondTV versions 4.8.1 and higher. The BeyondTV Login API changed in version 4.8.1. For that reason this plugin will *not* work with any version of BTV prior to v4.8.1.
This version of the BTVImporter has a Debug switch. The Debug switch when enabled will create a new log file every day. It will append debug information to the same log file if the date has not changed. Please note that there is a very large amount of debug information written to the log files so they can take up a lot of disk space. Enable this only if you are having problems.
Log files are written to the Logs sub-directory in the MeediOS data directory (default is c:\meedios\data\logs). This is a very rough version... if you find bugs, let me know!

plugin.name: ControlMee
plugin.desc: ControlMee allows you to use your Meedio remote to control external applications via key mappings. Supports import/export of program key maps to make it easy to share. Supports a keyboard hook and numeric keyboard.
plugin.author: Stewart Hargrave (EnemyWithin)
plugin.documenttext:
ControlMee allows you to use your Meedio remote to control external applications via key mappings. Supports import/export of program key maps to make it easy to share.
Directions at: http://controlmee.hargraveusa.com/
*New for v2.1: Added support for a numeric keyboard. Use the number keys (2...9) to type letters like on your cell phone. The max delay setting determines how long the plugin will wait between key presses before resetting the key to its initial numeric value.
***IMPORTANT***
ControlMee must be moved above "InputMapper" in the Fulltime Plug-ins list.

plugin.name: Default Icon Theme
plugin.author: Harald D. Wagner and Skypichat (skypichat)
plugin.documenttext:
This is the default icon theme
It's a standalone icon theme. It's also the fallback theme for other (incomplete) icon themes.
Additionally it provides icons for non-themed applications like ConfigurationEditor:
"user" is used as default user icon in ConfigurationEditor.exe "default" is used as last fallback possibility by MeediOS.exe if a given file or resource does not exist.
The mapping of resource names and file names is done on a per-UI-type basis. Resource names are UI independant, file names may be individual to the UI type. Resource names are theme independant, file names may be individual to the current theme. ResourceDictionary.WPFUI.xaml defines the mapping for WPFUI, ResourceDictionary.WinFormUI.XML defines the mapping for WinFormUI.
Icon resource names should have the following format:
Plugin name "radio", "music", ..., if applicable. Plugin type "-module", "-general", ..., if applicable. Task "-up", "-record", "-show", "-modify", "-rating", "-rotate", ..., if applicable. State "-sel","-unsel", "-active", "-inactive", "-down"/"-pressed", "-tv14", "-left", ... , if applicable. Place to find "-background", "-frame", "-indicator", ..., if applicable. Suffix "-icon".
Icon file names should have the same format plus the adequate file extension.

plugin.name: DiscID
plugin.desc: Identify audio, video, and photo discs. Please read the included documentation.
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)
plugin.documenttext:
This is a full time general plugin that waits for a disc to be inserted into the drive and then processes it based on your selected options. It will identify a variety of discs. Some options are handled by other programs. You should understand how these programs work. The first time a disc is inserted, the plugin will search your computer for these programs based on your options. If the programs are not found, the disc will eject and a screen will be displayed indicating what to install.
This plugin does not contain any code that will decrypt or remove copy protection from any disc. None of the programs that this plugin launches will remove any copy protection. The main point of this plugin is to identify discs based on a calculated hash of the original discs contents. Its likely that any alterations to the original disc will not allow it to be identified properly.
If you select a back up option, you acknowledge by using this plugin that you are familiar with the relevant laws of your country. You acknowledge that this plugin does not remove copy protection and cannot back up commercial discs. Options to backup audio, video, or photos are dependent on populated root directories using the "Media Locations" importer plugin. Add a new section to your MeediOS library named "GlobalPluginProperties" and then add the MediaLocations plugin to that library. Set the "Save To" locations for your media.

plugin.name: Easy Film Importer
plugin.desc: Easy to use film importer for MeediOS home theater application.

plugin.name: Madvr_VideoPlayer
plugin.desc: Video Player using MadVR and LAV directshow filters
plugin.author: ccrocker (ccrocker)
plugin.documenttext:
Video player engine based on WPFMediaKit and using LAV filters
WARNING It replaces (if present) WPFMediaKit.dll, DirectShowLib-2005.dll in the assemblies folder
Requirements - LAV Filters and Madvr must be installed (http://forum.doom9.org/showthread.php?t=156191) - Use WPFMediaKit.dll and DirectShowLib-2005.dll from this distribution. Meedios crashes if other versions of DirectShowLib-2005 are used. Both files should be placed in the assemblies folde. It has a special screen for the Evolution theme. But it doesn't overwrite any theme screen, uses it's own
Known Issues - Buffering and Downloading progress events are not being handled - Next and Previous don't work - Resume at the correct spot, but not at the spot shown to the user in the dialog box

plugin.name: MCE

plugin.name: NexTagGenre
plugin.desc: Attempt to retrieve Artist Genre on the net
plugin.author: Nexusone (nexusone)
plugin.documenttext:
NexTagGenre is a import plugin for meedios.
*** Plz make a backup before processing. So you can restore if you don't agree with tags found by this plugin. ***
Most of the time, audiofile genre tag is badly filled or even leaved blank. So it makes the Genre filter useless.
So NexTagGenre attempts to retrieve on the net the Genre of songs. It retrieve the tag from LastFm artist page.
NexTagGenre retrieve the Genre of the artist, and apply this genre to all the songs of this artist (Faster), because songs of an Artist are, most of the time, of the same genre.
See my audio import plugin : NexAudioImport to import Audio without overwritten already processed Tag Genres.
Detail of the options :
Options: --------
- Process ALL Songs : Processed all songs even songs already processed. Days between recheck is not used with this option
- Don't process already tagged Genre : Songs processed by NexTagGenre have a GenreProcessed tag filled with "---processed---". So you can bypass the already processed songs in the next import.
- Keep genre of Artist already in database : If an Artist song has already been processed (GenreProcessed = "---processed---") , you can reuse the same genre (and bio) for all the songs of this artist.
- Use Multi-Genre : You can tag Meedio Genre tag with multi genres (genre are separated with a pipe) . If not ticked, retrieve one genre only.
- Days Between recheck : Number of days between attempts to check genre for non already processed Genre (GenreProcessed <> "---processed---")
- Add actual genre to new found genre : If meedio tag genre contains genres, they will be add to new found genre.
Genres List -----------
List of authorized genres : List of authorized genres. You can add your own genres here. Only genres present in this list are used for tagging genre.

Respond is an event driven plugin that offers functionality similar to a lite scripting language. The plugin will listen for user-defined events (such as a video starting to play) and answer with user-defined responses.
Includes two example scripts. One is very useful for proper queue control with PlayMee.
